sentences.en: A document filed incorrectly can a delay in a business transaction.
sentences.cn: 不正确的归档会在商业事务中造成延误.

sentences.en: Any form with no signature or otherwise incorrectly completed will be void.
sentences.cn: 如本表格未有签署、或在其他方面填写不正确,则本表格将会作废.

sentences.en: He incorrectly used the product of velocity and weight to define momentum.
sentences.cn: 他错误地将动量定义为速度与重量的乘积.

sentences.en: He was told that the doors had been fitted incorrectly.
sentences.cn: 他被告知房门安装不当。

sentences.en: I'v filled in this form incorrectly.Can I have another blank?
sentences.cn: 我把表格填错了。再给我一张空白的，可以吗？

sentences.en: I've filled in this form incorrectly. Can I have another blank?
sentences.cn: 我把表格填错了. 再给我一张空白的,可以 吗 ?

sentences.en: She knows a lot of French words but pronounces them incorrectly.
sentences.cn: 她认识很多法语单词,但发音不准确.

sentences.en: She knows a lot of Spanish words but pronounces them incorrectly.
sentences.cn: 她懂不少西班牙词语,但她的发音不准.

sentences.en: Teams no longer listed incorrectly in transfer limit exceeded news item.
sentences.cn: 球队不再错误地列在达到租借限制的新闻项里.
刑事诉状的措辞不正确.

sentences.en: The magazine suggested incorrectly that he was planning to retire.
sentences.cn: 该杂志错误地暗示他正打算退休。

sentences.en: The oral message was incorrectly transmitted.
The server may be down or may be incorrectly configured.
sentences.cn: 可能是服务器已关,或配置不正确.

sentences.en: Their other names include blue hake , blue grenadier, whiting ( incorrectly ) and whiptail.
sentences.cn: 新西兰无须鳕西部产卵地仅有13% ～ 22%的原始非捕鱼区.

sentences.en: We've been trying to get back to you, Tom, but we think we took your number down incorrectly.
sentences.cn: 汤姆，我们一直试着给你回电话，可是，或许我们把你的号码写错了。

words.tran_cn: 错误的，不正确的；不适当的；不真实的
